title: Manage My Account (MMA)
description: Make paying your bill easy. Do it online.
cleaned_text: Manage My Account (MMA) MMA is available for Residential and Business Customers We make it easy and convenient to manage your CPS Energy account no matter where you go, as long as you have an Internet connection. Login: Click the Manage My Account button on the top of any page. What can you do in Manage My Account? - Access [My Energy Portal](/en/customer-support/my-energy-portal.html) - View and Print Current Bill - View Current Balance Due - Set Up Alert Preferences for power outages and monthly energy bills - [Read More about Alerts](https://www.cpsenergy.com/en/customer-support/outage-center/energy-alerts.html) - Pay By Check (free) - Pay By Credit Card (through our payment processor - $2.35 fee - [Read More in the FAQs](https://www.cpsenergy.com/content/dam/corporate/en/Documents/PaymentSystem-FAQs.pdf)) - Add/Update Emergency Contacts and Authorized Contacts - Set up a Payment Plan if you are unable to pay the full balance due - Reconnect service automatically when you pay your past due balance - Start / Stop / Transfer Service - Sign up for [AutoPay](/en/customer-support/ways-to-pay-my-bill/automatic-payments.html)or a [Budget Payment Plan](/en/customer-support/customer-assist-programs/budget-payment-plan.html) - View and print past bills - View Your Energy Usage - Update Mailing Address - Update Phone Number - Authorize Contacts - Manage Your Profile See
